caption.p:
Dry Stress (DS) for
Phytophthora ramorum
as modelled using CLIMEX with the CliMond dataset of historical climate normals centred on 1975. Where DS = 0, soil dryness does not limit the distribution of P. ramorum and where DS >0 dry stress is represented by a factor of 1000, with increasing limitation as DS increases.
Click here for additional data file.
